SELECT a.idProduct , imPrice as price, txDescription as description, pcDiscount as discount, ceiling(imPrice * (100 - pcDiscount) / 100) as priceDiscounted, case when a.dtProductState > current_date - 7 then 'S' else 'N' end as fgNewArrivals FROM ${database.schema}product a, ${database.schema}product_description b where a.idProduct = b.idProduct and b.idLanguages = #{languages} and a.idProductState = 1 and exists (select 1 from ${database.schema}article d where d.idProduct = a.idProduct and d.qtStock > 0)
and (imPrice * (100 - pcDiscount) / 100) >= #{minPrice}
and (imPrice * (100 - pcDiscount) / 100) <= #{maxPrice}
and a.dtProductState > current_date - 7
and exists (select 1 from ${database.schema}product_attribute c where c.idProduct = a.idProduct and c.idProductAttribute = 1 and c.pgProductAttribute = #{type})
and exists (select 1 from ${database.schema}product_attribute c where c.idProduct = a.idProduct and c.idProductAttribute = 2 and c.pgProductAttribute = #{gender})
and exists (select 1 from ${database.schema}product_attribute c where c.idProduct = a.idProduct and c.idProductAttribute = 5 and c.pgProductAttribute = #{brand})
and exists (select 1 from ${database.schema}article_attribute c, ${database.schema}article d where c.idProduct = a.idProduct and c.idProductAttribute = 4 and c.pgProductAttribute = #{size} and d.idProduct = a.idProduct and d.qtStock > 0 )
and exists (select 1 from ${database.schema}article_attribute c, ${database.schema}article d where c.idProduct = a.idProduct and c.idProductAttribute = 3 and c.pgProductAttribute = #{color} and d.idProduct = a.idProduct and d.qtStock > 0 )

SELECT txValore FROM ${database.schema}article_attribute a, ${database.schema}valori_attributo c, ${database.schema}valori_attributo_languages d, ${database.schema}article e where a.idProductAttribute = c.idProductAttribute and a.pgProductAttribute = c.pgProductAttribute and a.idProductAttribute = d.idProductAttribute and a.pgProductAttribute = d.pgProductAttribute and a.idProduct = #{idProduct} and a.idProductAttribute = #{idProductAttribute} and d.idLanguages = #{languages} and e.idProduct = a.idProduct and e.qtStock > 0

SELECT distinct(txValore) FROM ${database.schema}article_attribute a, ${database.schema}valori_attributo c, ${database.schema}valori_attributo_languages d, ${database.schema}article e where a.idProductAttribute = c.idProductAttribute and a.pgProductAttribute = c.pgProductAttribute and a.idProductAttribute = d.idProductAttribute and a.pgProductAttribute = d.pgProductAttribute and a.idProduct = #{idProduct} and a.idProductAttribute = #{idProductAttribute} and d.idLanguages = #{languages} and e.idProduct = a.idProduct and e.qtStock > 0

SELECT txValore FROM ${database.schema}product_attribute a, ${database.schema}product b, ${database.schema}attribute e, ${database.schema}valori_attributo c, ${database.schema}valori_attributo_languages d where a.idProduct = b.idProduct and a.idProductAttribute = c.idProductAttribute and a.pgProductAttribute = c.pgProductAttribute and a.idProductAttribute = d.idProductAttribute and a.pgProductAttribute = d.pgProductAttribute and a.idProduct = #{idProduct} and d.idLanguages = #{languages} and a.idProductAttribute = #{idProductAttribute} and e.idLanguages = d.idLanguages and e.idProductAttribute = a.idProductAttribute

SELECT a.idProductAttribute as attributo,txValore as valore FROM ${database.schema}product_attribute a, ${database.schema}attribute e, ${database.schema}valori_attributo c, ${database.schema}valori_attributo_languages d where a.idProductAttribute = c.idProductAttribute and a.pgProductAttribute = c.pgProductAttribute and a.idProductAttribute = d.idProductAttribute and a.pgProductAttribute = d.pgProductAttribute and a.idProduct = #{idProduct} and d.idLanguages = #{languages} and e.idLanguages = d.idLanguages and e.idProductAttribute = a.idProductAttribute
SELECT d.pgProductAttribute as attributo,txValore as valore FROM ${database.schema}valori_attributo_languages d where d.idLanguages = #{languages} and d.idProductAttribute = #{idProductAttribute}
SELECT d.pgProductAttribute as idGender,txValore as txGender FROM ${database.schema}valori_attributo_languages d where d.idLanguages = #{languages} and d.idProductAttribute = 1

SELECT d.pgProductAttribute as idType,txValore as txType FROM ${database.schema}valori_attributo_languages d where d.idLanguages = #{languages} and d.idProductAttribute = 2 and exists (select 1 from product a, product_attribute b, product_attribute c where a.idProductState = 1 and a.idProduct = b.idProduct and b.idProductAttribute = 1 and b.pgProductAttribute = #{idMenu} and a.idProduct = c.idProduct and c.idProductAttribute = d.idProductAttribute and c.pgProductAttribute = d.pgProductattribute)

SELECT a.idProduct as idProduct, a.imPrice as price, a.pcDiscount as discount, ceiling(a.imPrice * (100 - a.pcDiscount) / 100) as priceDiscounted, b.txDescription as description, case when a.dtProductState > current_date - 7 then 'S' else 'N' end as fgNewArrivals,
gendera.idProductAttribute as idGender, gendera.pgProductAttribute as pgGender, genderc.txAttributeName as txDescGender, genderd.txValore as txGender,
typea.idProductAttribute as idType, typea.pgProductAttribute as pgType, typec.txAttributeName as txDescType, typed.txValore as txType,
branda.idProductAttribute as idBrand, branda.pgProductAttribute as pgBrand, brandc.txAttributeName as txDescBrand, brandd.txValore as txBrand
FROM ${database.schema}product a, ${database.schema}product_description b,
${database.schema}product_attribute gendera, ${database.schema}valori_attributo genderb, ${database.schema}attribute genderc, ${database.schema}valori_attributo_languages genderd,
${database.schema}product_attribute typea, ${database.schema}valori_attributo typeb, ${database.schema}attribute typec, ${database.schema}valori_attributo_languages typed,
${database.schema}product_attribute branda, ${database.schema}valori_attributo brandb, ${database.schema}attribute brandc, ${database.schema}valori_attributo_languages brandd
where a.idProduct = #{idProduct} and a.idProduct = b.idProduct and b.idLanguages = #{languages}
and gendera.idProduct = a.idProduct and gendera.idProductAttribute = 1 and genderb.idProductAttribute = gendera.idProductAttribute and genderb.pgProductAttribute = gendera.pgProductAttribute and genderb.idProductAttribute = genderc.idProductAttribute and genderd.idProductAttribute = genderb.idProductAttribute and genderd.pgProductAttribute = genderb.pgProductAttribute and genderd.idLanguages = b.idLanguages
and typea.idProduct = a.idProduct and typea.idProductAttribute = 2 and typeb.idProductAttribute = typea.idProductAttribute and typeb.pgProductAttribute = typea.pgProductAttribute and typeb.idProductAttribute = typec.idProductAttribute and typed.idProductAttribute = typeb.idProductAttribute and typed.pgProductAttribute = typeb.pgProductAttribute and typed.idLanguages = b.idLanguages
and branda.idProduct = a.idProduct and branda.idProductAttribute = 5 and brandb.idProductAttribute = branda.idProductAttribute and brandb.pgProductAttribute = branda.pgProductAttribute and brandb.idProductAttribute = brandc.idProductAttribute and brandd.idProductAttribute = brandb.idProductAttribute and brandd.pgProductAttribute = brandb.pgProductAttribute and brandd.idLanguages = b.idLanguages

SELECT a.pgArticle as pgArticle, a.qtStock as qtStock,
sizea.idProductAttribute as idSize, sizea.pgProductAttribute as pgSize, sizec.txAttributeName as txDescSize, sized.txValore as txSize,
colora.idProductAttribute as idColor, colora.pgProductAttribute as pgColor, colorc.txAttributeName as txDescColor, colord.txValore as txColor
FROM ${database.schema}article a,
${database.schema}article_attribute sizea, ${database.schema}valori_attributo sizeb, ${database.schema}attribute sizec, ${database.schema}valori_attributo_languages sized,
${database.schema}article_attribute colora, ${database.schema}valori_attributo colorb, ${database.schema}attribute colorc, ${database.schema}valori_attributo_languages colord
where a.idProduct = #{idProduct}
and sizea.idProduct = a.idProduct and sizea.idProductAttribute = 4 and sizeb.idProductAttribute = sizea.idProductAttribute and a.pgArticle = sizea.pgArticle and sizeb.pgProductAttribute = sizea.pgProductAttribute and sizeb.idProductAttribute = sizec.idProductAttribute and sized.idProductAttribute = sizeb.idProductAttribute and sized.pgProductAttribute = sizeb.pgProductAttribute and sized.idLanguages = #{languages}
and colora.idProduct = a.idProduct and colora.idProductAttribute = 3 and colorb.idProductAttribute = colora.idProductAttribute and a.pgArticle = colora.pgArticle and colorb.pgProductAttribute = colora.pgProductAttribute and colorb.idProductAttribute = colorc.idProductAttribute and colord.idProductAttribute = colorb.idProductAttribute and colord.pgProductAttribute = colorb.pgProductAttribute and colord.idLanguages = sized.idLanguages
